name: FOS - PL/SQL Dynamic Content
description:
An enhanced PL/SQL Dynamic Content region with extra support for refreshing, lazy loading, spinners and more.

Free Plug-in under MIT License

All FOS plug-ins are released under MIT License, which essentially means it is free for everyone to use, no matter if commercial or private use.

Overview

The FOS - PL/SQL Dynamic Content plug-in is a refreshable region where you can output any HTML code using sys.htp.p calls or assigning the content to apex_application.g_clob_01. It supports Lazy Loading, Lazy Refresh, HTML Sanitization, can show a loading spinner and mask, and gives you before/after refresh events to hook into.

Using this plug-in you have complete control of the HTML output.
